alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 9:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, southwestern Kiowa and Bent Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 948 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms across portions of northwestern Prowers, southwestern Kiowa and Bent Counties, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hasty and McClave. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
